text: William Samuel Hall (November 8, 1871 – January 26, 1938) was a dentist and a Canadian federal politician. Hall was elected to the House of Commons of Canada as a Social Credit candidate. He defeated 5 other candidates to win his seat. Hall would die 3 years into his term vacating his seat on January 26, 1938. ==External links== * Category:1871 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Canadian dentists Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Alberta Category:Social Credit Party of Canada MPs
title: William Samuel Hall
